title: Central Xi’an City Break with Onsite Dining, Pool & Spa
description:
Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of Xi’an with a stay at this regal hotel set within the ancient Ming Dynasty city walls. Perfectly positioned in the city’s vibrant heart, you’re close to historic landmarks like the Bell and Drum Towers, and the Great Mosque of Xi’an. Don’t miss the awe-inspiring Mausoleum of Qin Shi Huang and the world-renowned Terracotta Army - an unforgettable UNESCO World Heritage site.

After a day of discovery, retreat to your spacious, comfortable room or take advantage of the hotel’s modern amenities. Whether it’s a revitalising session in the fitness centre or a moment of calm in the tranquil spa, you’ll find everything you need to relax and recharge.
offer_address: 319 Dongxin Street, Shaanxi Province, Xian 710004, China
